content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":174311,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとう、あるじ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you, master.\""},{"lineNumber":174312,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは！　そうだろう、そうだろう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha! That's right, isn't it!\""},{"lineNumber":174313,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Really...\""},{"lineNumber":174314,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな人形の為にケイブリスを倒すなんてな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"To think you'd defeat Cavebris for such a doll...\""},{"lineNumber":174315,"originalJapaneseLine":"「変な奴……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What a strange guy...\""},{"lineNumber":174316,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まさか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No way...\""},{"lineNumber":174317,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当にケイブリスを倒すとは、な……」","translatedEnglishLine":"To actually defeat Cavebris, huh...\""},{"lineNumber":174318,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスに傷つけられたカミーラが","translatedEnglishLine":"Camilla, wounded by Cavebris,"},{"lineNumber":174319,"originalJapaneseLine":"ボロボロの体ながら、気丈に立ち上がる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Though her body was battered, she stood resolutely."},{"lineNumber":174320,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま……魔人、カミーラ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"M-Majin Camilla...\""},{"lineNumber":174321,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まさか……まだ戦うなんてこと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"No way... still fighting...\""},{"lineNumber":174322,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":174323,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek!\""},{"lineNumber":174324,"originalJapaneseLine":"視線を向けられシィルが肩をすくめる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Seel shrugged as she was stared at."},{"lineNumber":174325,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんだこれは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What is this!?\""},{"lineNumber":174326,"originalJapaneseLine":"「か、カミーラ様、これはいったい……！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"C-Camilla-sama, what on earth is this...!?\""},{"lineNumber":174327,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのとき騒ぎを聞きつけた魔物将軍が","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment, the demon general who heard the commotion"},{"lineNumber":174328,"originalJapaneseLine":"部屋に現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"appeared in the room."},{"lineNumber":174329,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":174330,"originalJapaneseLine":"「見ての通りだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As you can see.\""},{"lineNumber":174331,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔軍を統率していたケイブリスは死んだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cavebris, who led the demon army, is dead.\""},{"lineNumber":174332,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No way!?\""},{"lineNumber":174333,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの、ケイブリス様が！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cavebris-sama!?\""},{"lineNumber":174334,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では我々はこれからどうしたら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then what should we do from now on...?\""},{"lineNumber":174335,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":174336,"originalJapaneseLine":"一瞬の逡巡を表情に滲ませ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Showing a moment's hesitation on her face,"},{"lineNumber":174337,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかしカミーラは優雅に頷いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Camilla gracefully nodded."},{"lineNumber":174338,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……後は私が引き継ごう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I will take over from here.\""},{"lineNumber":174339,"originalJapaneseLine":"「か、カミーラ様が！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"C-Camilla-sama!?\""},{"lineNumber":174340,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なにか不服が？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you have any objections?\""},{"lineNumber":174341,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いい、いえ、とんでもありません！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-No, not at all!\""},{"lineNumber":174342,"originalJapaneseLine":"　四天王の一角、カミーラ様なら文句など……」","translatedEnglishLine":"If it’s Camilla-sama, one of the Four Heavenly Kings, there would be no complaints...\""},{"lineNumber":174343,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただ、カミーラ様はあまり","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's just that Camilla-sama isn’t very"},{"lineNumber":174344,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そういったことに興味はないのかと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"interested in those kinds of things...\""},{"lineNumber":174345,"originalJapaneseLine":"「無駄口は好みじゃない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't like idle talk.\""},{"lineNumber":174346,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はいっ！　申し訳ありません！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes! I'm sorry!\""},{"lineNumber":174347,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人類圏に残存する魔物兵に伝えよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Inform the remaining demon soldiers in the Human Territory\""},{"lineNumber":174348,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すぐさま撤退せよと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"to immediately retreat.\""},{"lineNumber":174349,"originalJapaneseLine":"「て、撤退なさるのですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-You are going to retreat?\""},{"lineNumber":174350,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":174351,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、もも、申し訳ありません！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I'm very sorry!\""},{"lineNumber":174352,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すぐにーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Right away—!\""},{"lineNumber":174353,"originalJapaneseLine":"カミーラに睨まれた魔物将軍は","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon general, glared at by Camilla,"},{"lineNumber":174354,"originalJapaneseLine":"脱兎の如く駆けだした。","translatedEnglishLine":"fled like a runaway rabbit."},{"lineNumber":174355,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これでよいか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is this acceptable?\""},{"lineNumber":174356,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それとも、どちらかが滅亡するまでやるか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Or shall we continue until one of us perishes?\""},{"lineNumber":174357,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、それでいい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, that's fine.\""},{"lineNumber":174358,"originalJapaneseLine":"　グッドだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good.\""},{"lineNumber":174359,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、お前……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But you...\""},{"lineNumber":174360,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつから人間の味方になった」","translatedEnglishLine":"Since when did you become an ally of humans?\""},{"lineNumber":174361,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あれを殺した貴様らに対する、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It's a whim against you who killed that one.\""},{"lineNumber":174362,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気まぐれだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just a caprice.\""},{"lineNumber":174363,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我々も疲弊しました。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We are exhausted as well."},{"lineNumber":174364,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日はこれで撤収します。","translatedEnglishLine":"Today we will withdraw here."},{"lineNumber":174365,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦後交渉は後ほど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Negotiations after the war will follow later...\""},{"lineNumber":174366,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの……じゃあ、その……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-um... then, well...\""},{"lineNumber":174367,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、そうだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, that's right...\""},{"lineNumber":174368,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは！　ようやく終わったぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha! It's finally over!\""},{"lineNumber":174369,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":174370,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　そうだろう、そうだろう！」
こんな人形の為にケイブリスを倒すなんてな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To think you'd defeat Cavebris for such a doll..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にケイブリスを倒すとは、な……」
ケイブリスに傷つけられたカミーラが
ボロボロの体ながら、気丈に立ち上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though her body was battered, she stood resolutely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか……まだ戦うなんてこと……」
視線を向けられシィルが肩をすくめる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seel shrugged as she was stared at.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「か、カミーラ様、これはいったい……！？」
そのとき騒ぎを聞きつけた魔物将軍が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, the demon general who heard the commotion

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍を統率していたケイブリスは死んだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Cavebris, who led the demon army, is dead."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では我々はこれからどうしたら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then what should we do from now on...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬の逡巡を表情に滲ませ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Showing a moment's hesitation on her face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかしカミーラは優雅に頷いた。
「いい、いえ、とんでもありません！
四天王の一角、カミーラ様なら文句など……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it’s Camilla-sama, one of the Four Heavenly Kings, there would be no complaints..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういったことに興味はないのかと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: interested in those kinds of things..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいっ！　申し訳ありません！」
「人類圏に残存する魔物兵に伝えよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Inform the remaining demon soldiers in the Human Territory"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラに睨まれた魔物将軍は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general, glared at by Camilla,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 脱兎の如く駆けだした。
「それとも、どちらかが滅亡するまでやるか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or shall we continue until one of us perishes?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつから人間の味方になった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since when did you become an ally of humans?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あれを殺した貴様らに対する、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It's a whim against you who killed that one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はこれで撤収します。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Negotiations after the war will follow later..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　ようやく終わったぞー！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　そうだろう、そうだろう！」
こんな人形の為にケイブリスを倒すなんてな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To think you'd defeat Cavebris for such a doll..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にケイブリスを倒すとは、な……」
ケイブリスに傷つけられたカミーラが
ボロボロの体ながら、気丈に立ち上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though her body was battered, she stood resolutely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか……まだ戦うなんてこと……」
視線を向けられシィルが肩をすくめる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seel shrugged as she was stared at.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「か、カミーラ様、これはいったい……！？」
そのとき騒ぎを聞きつけた魔物将軍が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, the demon general who heard the commotion

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍を統率していたケイブリスは死んだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Cavebris, who led the demon army, is dead."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では我々はこれからどうしたら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then what should we do from now on...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬の逡巡を表情に滲ませ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Showing a moment's hesitation on her face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかしカミーラは優雅に頷いた。
「いい、いえ、とんでもありません！
四天王の一角、カミーラ様なら文句など……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it’s Camilla-sama, one of the Four Heavenly Kings, there would be no complaints..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういったことに興味はないのかと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: interested in those kinds of things..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいっ！　申し訳ありません！」
「人類圏に残存する魔物兵に伝えよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Inform the remaining demon soldiers in the Human Territory"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラに睨まれた魔物将軍は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general, glared at by Camilla,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 脱兎の如く駆けだした。
「それとも、どちらかが滅亡するまでやるか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or shall we continue until one of us perishes?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつから人間の味方になった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since when did you become an ally of humans?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あれを殺した貴様らに対する、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It's a whim against you who killed that one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はこれで撤収します。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Negotiations after the war will follow later..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　ようやく終わったぞー！」
